alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued December 02 at 3:12PM CST until December 02 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 345 PM CST. * At 312 PM CST, a dust channel was 5 miles northeast of Oakley, moving southeast at 15 mph. Several other intense plumes of dust will persist along Interstate 70 through 345 PM CST. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 36 and 74. Locations impacted include... Colby, Oakley, Brewster, Levant, Rexford, Gem and Mingo. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE! There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.
